title: Senator Aon Abbas warned for repeated misconduct in Senate session
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 15 (APP): Deputy Chairman Senate Syedaal Khan on Wednesday issued a stern warning to Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) Senator Aon Abbas for repeatedly violating the Senate’s rules of conduct.
Expressing his displeasure with the Senator’s behavior during the session, Khan pointed out that Aon had breached discipline on four separate occasions.
To address the matter, the Deputy Chairman summoned Aon’s parliamentary leader, Ali Zafar, to his chambers to ensure future adherence to parliamentary standards and maintain order. Khan stressed the critical importance of discipline within the Senate, underscoring that such behavior would not be tolerated moving forward.
